did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: State Records Center-Archives Annex, Library of Virginia

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Westmoreland County (Va.) Judgments, 1739-1914. Local government records collection, Westmoreland County Court Records. The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This item came to the Library of Virginia in shipments of court papers from Westmoreland County (Va.).

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Westmoreland County was formed from Northumberland County in 1653. Part of King George County was added in 1777.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Westmoreland County (Va.) Judgments, 1739-1914, contain civil cases in which justice was administered on the strictly formulated rules of common law. The majority of cases in this record series relate to matters of debt.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arrangement by year, month, and alphabetically by plaintiff surname.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Additional Westmoreland County Court Records can be found on microfilm at The Library of Virginia web site. Consult "A Guide to Virginia County and City Records on Microfilm."

controlaccess.head: Genre and Form Terms:
controlaccess.genreform: Local government records -- Virginia -- Westmoreland County.
